text: The Kazakh ambassador in Beijing is the official representative of the Government in Astana to the Government of the People's Republic of China with a concurrent Diplomatic accreditation in Hanoi (Vietnam), Ulaanbaatar (Mongolia) and Pyongyang (North Korea). ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !| Russian language :ru:Послы Казахстана в Китае !| Kazakh language !| Observations !| Prime Minister of Kazakhstan !| Premier of the People's Republic of China !| Term end |- | |Murat Muhtarovics Auezov |:ru:Ауэзов, Мурат Мухтарович |:kk:Мұрат Мұхтарұлы Әуезов |Murat Muhtarovics Auezov |Sergey Tereshchenko |Li Peng | |- | |Kuanysh Sultanovich Sultanov |:ru:Султанов, Куаныш Султанович | | |Akezhan Kazhegeldin |Li Peng | |- | |Zhanybek Salimovich Karibzhanov |:ru:Карибжанов, Жаныбек Салимович |:kk:Жәнібек Сәлімұлы Кәрібжанов |Zhanybek Salimovich Karibzhanov |Karim Massimov |Wen Jiabao | |- | |Ikram Adyrbekov |:ru:Адырбеков, Икрам Адырбекович | |(* July 8, 1950) Almaty Veterinary Institute, attached to the President of the Russian Federation Russian Academy of Public Administration. Farm scientist, economist, state and municipal government manager, Ph.D. was appointed assistant to the Kazakh president. |Karim Massimov |Wen Jiabao | |- | |Nurlan Ermekbaev |:ru:Ермекбаев, Нурлан Байузакович |:kk:Нұрлан Байұзақұлы Ермекбаев | |Serik Akhmetov |Wen Jiabao | |- | |Shakhrat Nuryshev |Шахрат Нурышев |Шахрат Нұрышев | |Karim Massimov |Li Keqiang | |} == References == Kazakhstan Category:Ambassadors of Kazakhstan to China
title: List of ambassadors of Kazakhstan to China
